problems.title: Long Wait Times for Citizens
problems.description: Residents wait hours on hold for simple questions about permits, licenses, or municipal services, creating frustration and lost productivity.

problems.title: Limited Service Hours
problems.description: Government offices close at 5 PM, but citizens need help evenings and weekends when they're free from work responsibilities.

problems.title: Complex Bureaucratic Processes
problems.description: Citizens get transferred between departments, creating confusion about which office handles their specific needs or questions.

problems.title: Language Barriers
problems.description: Non-native speakers struggle to navigate government services, limiting their access to essential public programs and support.

problems.title: Outdated Information Systems
problems.description: Staff provide conflicting information because different departments use outdated or non-integrated systems and procedures.

problems.title: No Emergency Communication
problems.description: During crises, citizens can't get timely updates about services, closures, or emergency procedures when they need them most.

solutions.title: 24/7 Citizen Support
solutions.description: AI agents handle government inquiries around the clock, ensuring citizens always get help with permits, services, and questions.
solutions.result_description: Always available when citizens need help

solutions.title: Multilingual Public Access
solutions.description: Support diverse communities in 50+ languages, ensuring equal access to government services for all residents.

solutions.title: Emergency Communication System
solutions.description: Instantly distribute critical alerts, safety information, and emergency updates to keep communities informed and safe.
solutions.result_description: Critical information when it matters most

solutions.title: Smart Service Navigation
solutions.description: Guide citizens through complex government processes, forms, and requirements with patient, step-by-step assistance.

solutions.title: Compliance & Legal Guidance
solutions.description: Help businesses and individuals understand regulations, permits, and legal requirements for full compliance.

solutions.title: Democratic Participation Hub
solutions.description: Facilitate citizen engagement in local government through meeting information, feedback collection, and civic participation.
